attributes.additional_details:
The family of Michael Graydon, who has disappeared in Monaco, require guidance, support and relevant official help from the UK which has not yet been completely assigned. This includes the Foreign Office, Interpol and UK Government.

We require our situation to be discussed within the Houses of Parliament. We need the official and relevant people of power to come forward and ask the questions the family needs answers to.

Please sign our petition as we fight for more help, Michael Graydon has disappeared and we need answers!

#FindMichaelGraydon
https://www.facebook.com/MissingMichaelGraydon?pnref=story#

rejection.details: This petition has been closed at the request of the FCO.
